column3: 350) races were those beings whose natural state is to exist as a union of fëa and hröa. These races were Elves
is a Quenya word meaning "Incarnates". It is used in reference to the Children of Ilúvatar
column4: who were designed to live as Fëa and hröa.

column1: Patrick H. Wynne has suggested that Mirröanwi can be analyzed as containing mi ("in") and hröa ("body").
